name: JavascriptCDN
overview:
JavascriptCDN is a revolutionary new way to load, deliver and manage your Javascripts. JavascriptCDN is the first script loading technology that has made module-level caching feasible in the browser.

The result of this infrastructure and technology is the first ever Browser Package Manager, to handle dependency management, caching, verisioning and loading with absolutely NO TRADEOFFS. JavascriptCDN is unlike any other script loading technology to date, and as such shares all the strengths and none of the tradeoffs or weaknesses of other script loading technologies.
